vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.4
§ Jahaziel = "beheld of God"
1) a Benjamite warrior who joined David at Ziklag
2) a priest in the reign of David who helped move the ark
3) a Kohathite Levite, 3rd son of Hebron
4) a Levite, son of Zechariah, of the sons of Asaph, in the reign of Jehoshaphat
5) an ancestor of one of the families who returned from exile with Ezra
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   guerrero; tribu de Benjamín; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   levita; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   hijo de Zacarías; levita; en tiempos del rey Josafat; (e)   padre de Secanías; descendiente de Zatu; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅哈悉 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神看見"
1) 在洗革拉投效大衛的一位便雅憫的勇士 (代上 12:4)
2) 大衛王時的一位祭司, 他協助約櫃的運送 (代上 16:6)
3) 歌轄的利未人, 希伯崙的三子 (代上 23:19;24:23)
4) 利未人撒迦利雅的兒子, 亞薩的後裔, 約沙法時代的人 (代下 20:14)
5) 和以斯拉一同回歸的一個家族的先人 (拉 8:5)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅哈悉 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神看见"
1) 在洗革拉投效大卫的一位便雅悯的勇士 (代上 12:4)
2) 大卫王时的一位祭司, 他协助约柜的运送 (代上 16:6)
3) 歌辖的利未人, 希伯仑的三子 (代上 23:19;24:23)
4) 利未人撒迦利雅的儿子, 亚萨的后裔, 约沙法时代的人 (代下 20:14)
5) 和以斯拉一同回归的一个家族的先人 (拉 8:5)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.16.6
§ Jahaziel = "beheld of God"
1) a Benjamite warrior who joined David at Ziklag
2) a priest in the reign of David who helped move the ark
3) a Kohathite Levite, 3rd son of Hebron
4) a Levite, son of Zechariah, of the sons of Asaph, in the reign of Jehoshaphat
5) an ancestor of one of the families who returned from exile with Ezra

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.19;
son of: Hebron (H2275B);
brother of: Jeriah (H3404), Amariah (H0568I) and Jekameam (H3360)
§ Jahaziel = "beheld of God"
1) a Benjamite warrior who joined David at Ziklag
2) a priest in the reign of David who helped move the ark
3) a Kohathite Levite, 3rd son of Hebron
4) a Levite, son of Zechariah, of the sons of Asaph, in the reign of Jehoshaphat
5) an ancestor of one of the families who returned from exile with Ezra
